I should also be cautious of the enemy snake #0, which is at (6, 3), but it's a bit far away from me, so I don't need to worry about it for now.

My strategy for the next turn is to eat the apple at (3, 4) and prioritize growing my body. If I'm able to eat more apples, I'll aim for the (1, 3) apple after this turn.

My next move: DOWN, LEFT
